contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentLabel: Xperience by Kentico – release process considerations and deployment on the SaaS environment
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentShortDescription: Are you interested in getting an Xperience by Kentico project setup for continuous deployment? Lukasz Skowroński, senior solutions architect at Konabos, authored a helpful walkthrough of the setup process for the Xperience project, Azure DevOps, and the Xperience Portal.
